name: Congregation
story_text: You focus your allies' wrath on a chosen foe.

low.conditions: as a free triggered action one ally within 10 squares of the target can use a strike signature ability against the target

mid.conditions: as a free triggered action one ally within 10 squares of the target can use a strike signature ability that gains an edge against the target

high.conditions: as a free triggered action two allies within 10 squares of the target can each use a strike signature ability that gains an edge against the target

effect: Each ally can shift up to 2 squares and gains 2 surges before making the strike.
